risinfo.chaptertitle: 20. Interviewing in Health, Medical, and Integrated Care Settings

sect1.title: Summary
sect1.para: In summary, psychologists play pivotal roles within the healthcare system not just by providing care to individuals and their families and consulting, but also via the opportunity to be someone’s first experience with a mental health clinician. These interactions can open doors and reduce stigmas for the individual and other disciplines through interdisciplinary and multidisciplinary collaboration. Though being a psychologist within a setting that once viewed the mind and body as separate can be a challenge with various unique complexities, it is also an opportunity to facilitate holistic, equitable, and culturally responsive care through a biopsychosocial lens. It is also an opportunity to learn a breadth of medical knowledge and develop impactful relationships while navigating a fast-paced environment with a myriad of presentations.
